resources.string: With our spa and message services you are getting the relaxing touch of an expert. With an aromatic pillow for your eyes, a choice of aroma therapy oil, and a heated pillow for your neck, our message offerings will restroe balance to min and body

Our spa manicure and pedicure service soothe with a warm neck pillow, Skin exfoliation and a hydrating message are extended to the elbow for manicures and to the knn foe pedicures, which also include a customized foot bath with essential oil.
Oasis Sap at 1268 Andrew Lane, Pond, OK 43277, 555-332-3366
